body_html:
After running python test_nn.py -v I am getting the error for test_variable_sequence_cuda when using 7.1.3. So it seems that the problem is not fixed on 7.1.3 for ppc64le

FAIL: test_variable_sequence_cuda (main.TestNN) (dtype=torch.float16)

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "test_nn.py", line 65, in call_helper
f(self, *args, dtype=dtype)
File "test_nn.py", line 3369, in test_variable_sequence_cuda
self._test_variable_sequence("cuda", dtype)
File "test_nn.py", line 3361, in _test_variable_sequence
self.assertEqual(p1.grad, p2.grad, dtype2prec[dtype])
File "/home/freddie/pytorch/test/common.py", line 245, in assertEqual
assertTensorsEqual(x, y)
File "/home/freddie/pytorch/test/common.py", line 237, in assertTensorsEqual
self.assertLessEqual(max_err, prec, message)
AssertionError: tensor(5.0391, dtype=torch.float16, device='cuda:0') not less than or equal to 0.01 :

Ran 1124 tests in 644.076s

FAILED (failures=2, skipped=7)

body:
After running python test_nn.py -v   I am getting the error for test_variable_sequence_cuda when using 7.1.3.   So it seems that the problem is not fixed on 7.1.3 for ppc64le

FAIL: test_variable_sequence_cuda (__main__.TestNN) (dtype=torch.float16)

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test_nn.py", line 65, in call_helper
    f(self, *args, dtype=dtype)
  File "test_nn.py", line 3369, in test_variable_sequence_cuda
    self._test_variable_sequence("cuda", dtype)
  File "test_nn.py", line 3361, in _test_variable_sequence
    self.assertEqual(p1.grad, p2.grad, dtype2prec[dtype])
  File "/home/freddie/pytorch/test/common.py", line 245, in assertEqual
    assertTensorsEqual(x, y)
  File "/home/freddie/pytorch/test/common.py", line 237, in assertTensorsEqual
    self.assertLessEqual(max_err, prec, message)
AssertionError: tensor(5.0391, dtype=torch.float16, device='cuda:0') not less than or equal to 0.01 :

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Ran 1124 tests in 644.076s

FAILED (failures=2, skipped=7)
